data.title: Gauhati University, Guwahati, Guwahati
data.meta_description: Gauhati University, Guwahati is located in Guwahati, Assam It is established in 1948 and Approved by University Grants Commission.
data.text:
Gauhati University, Guwahati (GU, Guwahati) is a public state university in Guwahati, Assam, India. It was established on January 26, 1948, by an Act passed by the Assam Legislative Assembly. It is Northeast India's oldest university.

GU, Gauhati is envisioned upon the path of imparting quality education to the aspirants and raising eminent educational professionals and getting acknowledged as one of the premier universities of India. The university has more than 100 courses under the various faculties of liberal arts, commerce science business management, and engineering. The admission procedure is held offline solely based on merit score and eligibility criteria.

The eminent faculties are the plank of the enterprise who had been mentoring the aspirants for years. The placement cell of GU, Guwahati provides proper guidance and assistance in order to shape the students ready for the industry.
